entries.title: The Biggest Partnership in VR history (this is a massive deal)
entries.description:
Hello and welcome to: TUESDAY NEWSDAY! Your number one resource for the entire week's worth of VR news! This week is HOT as the excitement for new headsets mounts. Meta and Qualcomm announce a massive partnership, practically ending Meta's own custom silicon goals while there seems to be a problem with SteamVR that really needs to be addressed. PLUS! Lots of exciting new games coming! BUCKLE UP!
